body:
This essentially updates instructions for importing Maoni transitively in an Android project. Otherwise, you might be impacted by the following issues:
- #253 
- #294 

Few internal dependencies have also been upgraded.

## What's Changed
* chore(deps): Bump leakcanary-android from 2.6 to 2.7 by @dependabot in https://github.com/rm3l/maoni/pull/228
* chore(deps): Bump kotlin_version from 1.4.31 to 1.4.32 by @dependabot in https://github.com/rm3l/maoni/pull/227
* chore(deps): Bump leakcanary-android from 2.6 to 2.7 in /maoni-sample by @dependabot in https://github.com/rm3l/maoni/pull/226
* chore(deps): Bump stetho from 1.5.1 to 1.6.0 in /maoni-sample by @dependabot in https://github.com/rm3l/maoni/pull/230
* chore(deps): Bump stetho from 1.5.1 to 1.6.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/rm3l/maoni/pull/229
* chore(deps): Bump actions/cache from v2 to v2.1.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/rm3l/maoni/pull/231
* chore(deps): Bump aboutlibraries_version from 8.8.4 to 8.8.5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/rm3l/maoni/pull/233
* chore(deps): Bump actions/setup-java from v1 to v2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/rm3l/maoni/pull/234
* chore(deps): Bump actions/cache from v2.1.4 to v2.1.5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/rm3l/maoni/pull/235
* chore(deps): Bump publish-plugin from 1.0.0 to 1.1.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/rm3l/maoni/pull/237
* chore(deps): Bump kotlin_version from 1.4.32 to 1.5.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/rm3l/maoni/pull/238
* chore(deps): Bump play-publisher from 2.3.0 to 3.4.0-agp7.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/rm3l/maoni/pull/239
* chore(deps): Bump Gradle to 7.0.1 by @rm3l in https://github.com/rm3l/maoni/pull/241
* chore(deps): Bump gradle from 4.2.0 to 4.2.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/rm3l/maoni/pull/242
* chore(deps): Bump aboutlibraries_version from 8.8.5 to 8.8.6 by @dependabot in https://github.com/rm3l/maoni/pull/243
* chore(deps): Bump appcompat from 1.2.0 to 1.3.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/rm3l/maoni/pull/244
* chore(deps): Bump aboutlibraries_version from 8.8.6 to 8.9.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/rm3l/maoni/pull/245
* chore(deps): Bump kotlin_version from 1.5.0 to 1.5.10 by @dependabot in https://github.com/rm3l/maoni/pull/246
* chore(deps): Bump actions/cache from 2.1.5 to 2.1.6 by @dependabot in https://github.com/rm3l/maoni/pull/247
* chore(deps): Bump play-publisher from 3.4.0-agp7.0 to 3.5.0-agp7.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/rm3l/maoni/pull/250
* chore(deps): Bump kotlin_version from 1.5.10 to 1.5.20 by @dependabot in https://github.com/rm3l/maoni/pull/249
* chore(deps): Bump material from 1.3.0 to 1.4.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/rm3l/maoni/pull/252
* chore(deps): Bump gradle from 4.2.1 to 4.2.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/rm3l/maoni/pull/251
* chore(deps): Bump kotlin_version from 1.5.20 to 1.5.21 by @dependabot in https://github.com/rm3l/maoni/pull/254
* chore(deps): Bump appcompat from 1.3.0 to 1.3.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/rm3l/maoni/pull/256
* chore(deps): Bump aboutlibraries_version from 8.9.0 to 8.9.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/rm3l/maoni/pull/255
* chore(deps): Bump kotlin_version from 1.5.21 to 1.5.30 by @dependabot in https://github.com/rm3l/maoni/pull/259
* chore(deps): Bump kotlin_version from 1.5.30 to 1.5.31 by @dependabot in https://github.com/rm3l/maoni/pull/261
* chore(deps): Bump aboutlibraries_version from 8.9.1 to 8.9.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/rm3l/maoni/pull/264
* chore(deps): Bump aboutlibraries_version from 8.9.3 to 8.9.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/rm3l/maoni/pull/266
* chore(deps): Bump kotlin_version from 1.5.31 to 1.6.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/rm3l/maoni/pull/267
* chore(deps): Bump actions/cache from 2.1.6 to 2.1.7 by @dependabot in https://github.com/rm3l/maoni/pull/269
* chore(deps): Bump kotlin_version from 1.6.0 to 1.6.10 by @dependabot in https://github.com/rm3l/maoni/pull/271
* chore(deps): Bump leakcanary-android from 2.7 to 2.8.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/rm3l/maoni/pull/273
* chore(deps): Bump gradle from 4.2.2 to 7.0.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/rm3l/maoni/pull/270
* chore(deps): Bump gradle from 7.0.4 to 7.1.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/rm3l/maoni/pull/276
* chore(deps): Bump gradle from 7.1.0 to 7.1.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/rm3l/maoni/pull/277
* chore(deps): Bump gradle from 7.1.1 to 7.1.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/rm3l/maoni/pull/279
* chore(deps): Bump actions/checkout from 2 to 3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/rm3l/maoni/pull/282
* chore(deps): Bump actions/cache from 2.1.7 to 3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/rm3l/maoni/pull/285
* chore(deps): Bump kotlin_version from 1.6.10 to 1.6.20 by @dependabot in https://github.com/rm3l/maoni/pull/288
* chore(deps): Bump actions/setup-java from 2 to 3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/rm3l/maoni/pull/290
* chore(deps): Bump actions/upload-artifact from 2 to 3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/rm3l/maoni/pull/289
* chore(deps): Bump gradle from 7.1.2 to 7.1.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/rm3l/maoni/pull/291


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rm3l/maoni/compare/9.1.0...10.0.0

This release essentially adds the **ability to capture screenshots from modal dialogs**. The `Maoni#start` method has been overloaded to accept a `Dialog` instance. So you can now pass either an `Activity` or a `Dialog` to this method, e.g.: ```java //The optional file provider authority allows you to //share the screenshot capture file to other apps (depending on your callback implementation) new Maoni.Builder(, MY_FILE_PROVIDER_AUTHORITY) .withDefaultToEmailAddress("feedback@my.company.com") .build() .start(); ``` ## Preview Thanks @dennisdeng2002 for this contribution !

name: v8.3.2
body: This release mostly contains dependency upgrades.

name: v8.0.2
body: - For an easier maintenance, all callbacks repositories have been merged into this parent repository. This includes `maoni-doorbell`, `maoni-email`, `maoni-github`, `maoni-jira` and `maoni-slack`. Further developments will be done in this repository from now on.

### Patches 

- Add a Settings activity to the sample app: ba230c0e856dd2deec601089102f1780a52c2934
- Merge pull request #44 from rm3l/feature/more_settings_in_sample_app: 6bde8e80db3b15cdb180554bf192b5b7b24da95e
- [ref #42] Customize the ability to have screen and logs capturing capabilities: 036827b3aabe5498488142f66f1a6c9665a4e504
- [fix #42] Customize the ability to have screen and logs capturing capabilities: 492bafe25c47770e084c02f65e48340da2a41373
- Merge pull request #45 from rm3l/feature/42_customize_logs_screen_capturing: edd831461a301bfea44e4c38e39721de13641df1

### Major Changes 
- Fix Send Button hiding behaviour: 0a4e61150e67f50c0e474807f9196cead090e63d
- Add option to control keyboard visibility on Feedback activity start: af82bd75bfb7dbd89f145dbc3809674675d1c3c9

### Minor Changes 

- Sanitize locales dirs in 'src/main/play'', so it compiles with what we have in Google Play Store: 2f6d68b394ee7373a31a5c661bdacd8c8b6be3b3
- Update README.md: 96b64a28844cf36b262b7e26d77c8d1a55c25405

- Sanitize locales dirs in 'src/main/play'', so it compiles with what we have in Google Play Store: 88bdd8679fa9a9b7913140520235e7b2159dfb2b

## Maoni Lib
- Application logs are now captured and included in the Feedback object
- Performance improvements
  - Addressed potential activity memory leaks, by allowing callers to unregister handlers, listeners or validators. Actually, `MaoniActivity` will auto-clear strong references when it exits. This requires callers to reset their handlers when they are done. Furthermore, `Maoni#start(...)` can no longer be called twice.
  - Reduced memory footprint when loading image views (especially, screen captures). Thumbnail preview has been reduced to a 100x100 size, since it does not need to be loaded at full resolution.

### Breaking changes
-  `Maoni#start(...)` can no longer be called twice. An `UnsupportedOperationException` is thrown.

name: v2.0.0
body:
## Maoni Lib
- Upgrade to Android SDK 24
- #2 Drop calls to SwingBuilder, so signing information is not asked when not necessary
- Fix the way device information is retrieved. Note that this contains breaking changes in the Feedback API, as pictured in the section below

### Breaking changes
-  The Feedback.Device class has been removed, in favor of a separate DeviceInfo class, which contains everything related to the Device

## maoni-email
- Email body has been updated to read info from the new DeviceInfo class => the email to send as feedback now contains much more details about the device

## Maoni Sample App
- Upgrade to Android SDK 24

## Maoni Lib
- Let callbacks decide whether or not to finish the Maoni activity upon a click on the 'Send Feedback' button

## Maoni Sample App
- Leverage a ScrollView in sample app main activity layout
